title: Ultracyclist Vedangi Kulkarni Wanted to Be the Fastest. Instead, She’ll Be the First
content:
Although the 26-year-old from India won't break the record for fastest circumnavigation of the globe by bike, she will be the first to have ridden around the world twice.

Read the full article at Ultracyclist Vedangi Kulkarni Wanted to Be the Fastest. Instead, She’ll Be the First on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
